locations.description:
• The problem is clear, but you'll need to decide how to <c="green">solve it</c>.
• Chop down trees to build a raft, or swim across (might want to practice first), or build a bridge, or look for vines.
• Alternatively, play an <c="green">escape room</c>.

Shouldn't last indefinitely, as many scenarios could.
locations.name: River Crossing

locations.description: Attempt to take over the world, or at least a significant part of it. Could also be in outer space. Develop technology and build resources along the way. This could be simple like Risk, or complex like Civilization.
locations.name: Empire

locations.description: • Various forms of transportation for part of the trip: train, bus, taxi, plane, boat, wagon. • Buy food as well as tickets, with a limited supply of money. • Consider a foreign country, with some descriptions in other languages. Include English translations if you plan on sharing the scenario with a wider audience. • Keep your party safe and healthy through setbacks and challenges. • The goal could be reaching new territory to settle, winning a bet, or arriving at a vacation spot. Classic examples are Oregon Trail and Around the World in 80 Days.
locations.name: Journey

locations.description: • Play at politics to get elected. Try an inspiring slogan to gain popularity, such as, Change for a brighter future! • Persuade congress to pass important laws that the people care about, such as, More Dogs and Fewer Cats. • Build a bigger city, with transportation, schools, hospitals, and fire departments. SimCity is a good example of city-building, though it doesn't go much into diplomacy.
locations.name: Mayor

locations.description:
Grow, train, and play with an animal or fantasy creature.

• Track <c="green">skills and needs</c> with general items.
• There is a child responsible for taking care of and enjoying it.
locations.name: Pet

overall.description: A list to look through and take inspiration from. Begin with a blank setup and copy the title and description of your choice into Overall Settings.
overall.title: Unformed Ideas
